base:
---
- name: Automatically generated playbook
	hosts: all
apache_tasks:
- name: Actualizar repositorios
			apt:
				update_cache: yes
				cache_valid_time: 3600

		- name: Instalar Apache
			apt:
				name: apache2
				install_recommends: yes
				state: present

		- name: Cambiar document root
			lineinfile:
				dest: "/etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf"
				regexp: "/var/www/html"
				line: "{{ document_root }}"
				state: present
			notify:
				- restart apache2

		- name: Cambiar nombre del servidor
			lineinfile:
				dest: "/etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf"
				regexp: "#ServerName www.example.com"
				line: "ServerName {{ server_name }}"
				state: present
			notify:
				- restart apache2
apache_handlers:
- name: restart apache2
			service:
				name: apache2
				state: restarted
nginx_tasks:
- name: Actualizar repositorios
			apt:
				update_cache: yes
				cache_valid_time: 3600

		- name: Instalar Nginx
			apt:
				name: nginx
				install_recommends: yes
				state: present

		- name: Cambiar document root
			lineinfile:
				dest: "/etc/nginx/sites-available/default"
				regexp: "/var/www/html"
				line: "{{ document_root }}"
				state: present
			notify:
				- restart nginx

		- name: Cambiar nombre del servidor
			lineinfile:
				dest: "/etc/nginx/sites-available/default"
				regexp: "server_name _;"
				line: "server_name {{ server_name }};"
				state: present
			notify:
				- restart nginx
nginx_handlers:
- name: restart nginx
			service:
				name: nginx
				state: restarted
php_tasks:
- name: Actualizar repositorios
			apt:
				update_cache: yes
				cache_valid_time: 3600

		- name: Instalar PHP
			apt: 
				name: {{ '{{' }} items {{ '}}' }}
				state: present
			with_items:
				- php{{ version }}
				- php{{ version }}-cli
				- php{{ version }}-common
python_tasks:
- name: Actualizar repositorios
			apt:
				update_cache: yes
				cache_valid_time: 3600

		- name: Instalar Python
			apt: 
				name: python{{ version }}
				state: present
